name: The Chosen Door(DEMO)
description:
The Chosen Door(DEMO):

Doors is a peaceful puzzle game (Demo). You play as a Night Warrior and by order of the Great Master, had to solve some puzzles and use your brain instead of your sword. Every level have a Book with some Info, so you can  figure it out.

What’s important is how wonderful it looks. It’s a constant joy just to stare at, but the most important think is to solve the mystery. Got it, warrior?

How to install:
  • Download the game from Itch.
  • Extract the game file.
  • Run the game.

This Game Was Made With Love By MiMu Games S. Thanx all.
